title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even when it should be disabled.
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be disabled when it is not applicable.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Java perspective. 2. Right-click on any resource in the workspace. 3. Observe that the "Build" action is enabled even when it should be disabled.
